question:
Consider the following agreements:
  1. Basic Exchange and Cooperation Agreement (BECA)
  2. CISMOA (Communication Interoperability and Security Memorandum Agreement)
  3. Logistics Exchange Memorandum of Agreement (LEMOA)
As of now, India is a signatory to which of the above with U.S.?
explanation: These are three defence sector “foundational agreements” which are routine instruments used by the US for geospatial intelligence to promote military cooperation with partner-countries. These agreements are foundational but are not the prerequisites for holding bilateral cooperation with US. India has not signed any of the three.
